name: Crackbird
description:
Crackbird: Catch the Golden Egg

One Ability in One Direction, One Minute, One Goal!

Summary: Try to catch the golden egg before the timer expires, but watch out for slimes! Create cracks that hinder the egg and slimes. Collect coconuts to recharge your crack powers!

Controls: WASD for movement, SPACEBAR for action

Created with Unity for the Game Makers Toolkit 2019 Jam, all original art and code!

Credits:
Programming & Game Design:  Eric Rouleau
Art Design & 3D Modeling and Animation:  Ryan Navarro
Producer:  Sharon Navarro
